thread.title: At The K when the Royals took pennant? Find yourself in this pic
thread.title_full: At The K when the Royals took pennant? Find yourself in this pic - KCTV5

author: Chris Oberholtz, Multimedia Producer
title: At The K when the Royals took pennant? Find yourself in this pic
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - Where were you when the Royals wrapped up the American League pennant with a 4-3 win over the Toronto Blue Jays in Game 6 of the ALCS?
If you were one of the 40,494 fans at Kauffman Stadium on Friday night, you might be able to find yourself cheering in a high-resolution panoramic image. 
The image was made by combining 120 overlapping photos taken in a grid pattern during the second and third innings.
The final hi-res file is 74,268 x 26,384 pixels or 1,959 megapixels and taken by photographer Preston Mack.
Click here to tag and find yourself in the photo.
The Royals will host the New York Mets in Game 1 of the World Series on Tuesday.
